title: Transformers.Fall.of.Cybertron.3D.FIXER-PirateHelix
description:
Update
Shadows fixed/Hud changes

Fixed/Removed: 
- All Ghosthing fixed (smoke, fog, etc.)
- Icons Highlight 2D fixed
- Lensflares removed
- HUD Fixed
- DOF/Motion Blur removed (Thanks to eqzitara to removed those effects, really ugly and bad in this game)

Remaining issues: 
- i supose minor issues, if you found some please post a comment and picture.

Optional:
Press U to cycle from [2] different depth/convergence settings.

Instructions: 
- Use the Masseffect 3 profile with Nvidia inspector (Download Tutorial) or rename .exe to "masseffect3.exe" (MUST)
 - Extract the content of the .zip where .exe is located.
- Press F6 to suggested convergence value, you can change that value deleting the preset 1 content in .ini file.

Finish the game with none issues, the game is great btw (if you like Transformers of course).

Note: I'm tested and playing the game with the 304.79 Beta driver. 306.02 Beta driver may not work properly because nvidia update/change the masseffect3 profile.

Note 2: With the 306.23 and 306.97 whql driver use the "Prototype 2" profile (prototype2.exe)


TOTURIAL :
